[al:Broke In A Minute]

[00:00.00]Broke In A Minute (Explicit) - Tory Lanez
[00:00.73]Lyrics by：Anthony Woart Jr/Daystar Peterson
[00:01.46]Composed by：Anthony Woart Jr/Daystar Peterson
[00:02.19]Yeah word to Mozzy n***a
[00:05.30]F**k these n***as talkin' 'bout n***a
[00:07.76]Haha
[00:09.06]When they swing that way to the right you swing to the left you heard
[00:16.88]Woo d**n
[00:18.18]I ain't been broke in a minute don't get offended
[00:20.72]Tore off the bow in a Bentley f**king your ho in her kidney
[00:23.71]F**k up the city I do not dance I jiggy
[00:26.25]Gun is tucked under this Fendi
[00:27.61]I like it I spend it I just came right out the jeweler
[00:30.03]The ice on my neck and my wrist and my fist I ain't finished
[00:32.71]I was just workin' at Denny's came back and counted some millions
[00:35.70]I ain't no regular civilian
[00:37.25]Red yellow green look like my neck a chameleon
[00:40.26]Uh okay spin it uh d**n I ain't been broke in a minute
[00:44.19]I hit his b***h he offended
[00:45.67]I'm in Givency and Fendi they let me finish
[00:48.30]I cut that Chevy for forty my scammer busting bottoms off the oh eh
[00:51.68]I cannot cuff shes f**king on my brozay
[00:53.70]I'm just going to f**kin' treat it like a throw away
[00:55.80]Ooh d**n I ain't been broke in a minute
[00:58.19]I'm at the mall out in Venice
[00:59.81]I need to swipe and the digit
[01:01.25]Calling up Kelz he did 250 on biddie
[01:03.90]It ain't no biggie ugh Moncler kick it
[01:06.29]F**k that lil b***h made a viddie
[01:07.84]She want to leak it she want to send it
[01:09.70]Aye f**k that b***h my face wasn't in it
[01:12.24]D**n b***h do scams on bitty
[01:14.26]Bands in my hands look pretty
[01:15.77]Hit another band on the gram I'm litty
[01:17.76]When I was broke man she fronted
[01:19.08]But then I got rich and I hit it
[01:20.76]Homie I don't dance I jiggy
[01:22.20]W**d is so strong I feel like I'm Popeye off the spinach
[01:24.64]I cut the corner and bend it
[01:26.15]B***h I'm a menace like Dennis
[01:27.84]Don't sell me p***y I need a percentage
[01:29.78]If you gon f**k me this s**t is expensive
[01:31.79]Nordstorm rack swipe my gift
[01:33.75]D**n I ain't been broke in a minute
[01:35.69]Woo woo woo
[01:38.35]I ain't been broke in a minute
[01:39.76]D**n woo
[01:42.25]I ain't been broke in a minute
[01:43.76]Woo woo woo
[01:45.76]D**n I ain't been broke in a minute
[01:47.79]Woo
[01:49.76]D**n I ain't been broke in a minute d**n
data.trans:
[ti:Broke In A Minute (Explicit)]
[ar:Tory Lanez]
[al:Broke In A Minute]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:00.73]//
[00:01.46]//
[00:02.19]向Mozzy保证 兄弟
[00:05.30]这些家伙在说什么 兄弟
[00:07.76]//
[00:09.06]当他们向右摇摆时 你就向左摇摆 听到了吗
[00:16.88]//
[00:18.18]我已经很久没有尝过贫穷的滋味 谁都不会冒犯我
[00:20.72]开着宾利车飞驰 和你的女人缠绵
[00:23.71]主宰整个城市 我不跳舞 我随心所欲
[00:26.25]芬迪外套里藏着一把枪
[00:27.61]我喜欢钱 我尽情花钱 我刚从珠宝店里出来
[00:30.03]脖子上挂着钻石 手腕上戴着钻石 手指上也有钻石 我过得正风光
[00:32.71]我以前在饭店里打工 如今手里握着百万钞票
[00:35.70]我不是普通人
[00:37.25]脖子上的宝石各种颜色 红的 黄的 绿的 看起来就像变色龙
[00:40.26]嗨起来 我已经很久没有尝过贫穷的滋味
[00:44.19]我霸占了他的女人 他觉得很生气
[00:45.67]我穿着纪梵希和芬迪 它们让我变完美
[00:48.30]我把那辆雪佛兰丢掉 我勾搭的姑娘对我服服帖帖
[00:51.68]我不能跟她认真 她在和我的兄弟搞暧昧
[00:53.70]我只想跟她一夜风流
[00:55.80]我已经很久没有尝过贫穷的滋味
[00:58.19]我在威尼斯的商场里
[00:59.81]我得挥霍一番
[01:01.25]联系Kelz 他刚在女人身上花了好多钱
[01:03.90]没什么大不了 玩得尽兴就行了
[01:06.29]和那小妞缠绵 录个小视频
[01:07.84]她想把视频散播出去
[01:09.70]和那小妞亲热一番 我没有很认真
[01:12.24]这娘们为鸡毛蒜皮的事情胡闹
[01:14.26]钞票我在我手中 看起来真好看
[01:15.77]Instagram又收获了一千粉丝 我真火
[01:17.76]当我很穷的时候 她看不起我
[01:19.08]但后来我发财了 把她搞定了
[01:20.76]朋友 我不跳舞 我随心所欲
[01:22.20]那种东西劲好大 我感觉像是吃了菠菜的大力水手
[01:24.64]只需要一点点 就能很快活
[01:26.15]碧池 我就是个坏人 就像淘气阿丹
[01:27.84]不要给我送女人来 我只想要赚钱
[01:29.78]如果你想和我亲热 价格可不便宜
[01:31.79]逛逛商店 刷我的卡
[01:33.75]我已经很久没有尝过贫穷的滋味
[01:35.69]//
[01:38.35]我已经很久没有尝过贫穷的滋味
[01:39.76]//
